ygData.subject: RE: Re: Selo's and root
ygData.msgSnippet: This is similar to what I noticed last week as well.  I was in Kithicor and got a root icon on me (checked and it was root) but I was still running with Selo s
ygData.messageBody:
This is similar to what I noticed last week as well. I was in Kithicor and
got a root icon on me (checked and it was root) but I was still running with
Selo's all the way to highhold. I zoned in and immediately was rooted in
place. I had assumed an orc medic ahd got me, but now it seems more likely
there is some Selo's/Root bug still lurking out there. Not sure what the
exact conditions were, but if it happens again I will check for sure.

Kitasi

From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>

When Kithicor first became undead hell, I got rooted by an undead
healer(?), was able to run into Rivervale, and once I had zoned in,
discovered that I was rooted.

Early Last week I was in unrest and got rooted, I broke out on the next
pulse. managed to zone out, and once again discovered that I was rooted
OUTSIDE the zone.
